title: Full Stack React App
description: A React school course database with a REST API to allow users to log in, create and modify their own courses on the condition of creating a user account.

title: Nodejs and Express Site
description: A portfolio site built with a Express backend and Pug template to showcase earlier projects from Treehouse. Set a Kill Bill style with a fictional cat named the Black Mamba.

title: SQL Library Manager
description: A Express library site with the capabilites of adding, searching and removing books from a SQL database.

title: React Gallery
description: A React search image gallery that is implemented with the http requests libary Axios to fetch data from Flickr's API.

title: Public API Request
description: Retrieve and display random users using the Fetch API to fetch data from RandomUser API.

title: Game Show App
description: A word guessing game built with Javascript's Object Oriented Programming paradigm.
